snippet.title: JoJo's Venture playthrough (Dreamcast) (1CC)
snippet.description:
60fps available!

The Dreamcast JoJo includes two games: JoJo's Venture and JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, both of which are fighting games by Capcom. Here's a playthrough of the first game with Jotaro.

According to the Internet, to get Death 13 to appear you need to finish several rounds with super moves. However it seems you actually need to finish every round with a super move. I tried and tried to get him to appear but he wouldn't, so when I re-watched my original playthrough of this, I noticed I got a super finish on everyone. So if you desperately need to see me fight Death 13, see my original playthrough:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bOaIFzyo7cs
